channel.title: Sport on Neil Grogan
channel.description: Recent content in Sport on Neil Grogan

item.title: Hurling - Four in a row?
item.description: One cannot help but be amazed at Kilkenny; true masters of the Irish Gaelic Sport of hurling. I mean as my previous posts mention I have moved to Kilkenny; and rural South Kilkenny at that. They live and breath Hurling down here: it’s literally a way of life. That is why they are so good; no mystery here folks: its is literally bred into children in schools and everyone plays it.
